name: tensorflow_1_14_image_class_predict
description: Making predictions using image classification models built with Tensorflow 1.14

inputs.name: model
inputs.help: The Tensorflow image classification model to use for making predictions.

inputs.name: data
inputs.help: The dataset to generate predictions for.

parameters.name: top-x
parameters.help: The top X predictions to output.

parameters.name: store-predictions
parameters.help: If enabled, the predictions get stored back in the dataset that they were generated for.

parameters.name: confidence-scores
parameters.help: The semicolon-separated list of classes for calculating confidence scores, which get stored back in the meta-data of the image.
